properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 10 at 3:20AM PST until February 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Wind advisory extended through this morning for Lake
Tahoe but discontinued across the rest of the Basin.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Waves 1
to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Tahoe.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong east winds will continue right along
the Sierra crest today.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING FOR LAKE TAHOE
